'''Guides of a Journey''' is the [[Guidance of the Land]] box that can be obtained from purchasing the Gnostic Hymn or Gnostic Chorus packages for [[Battle Pass]] that allows choosing [[Talent Book]]s from any [[region]].

After reaching the prerequisite levels, collecting the box will prompt the player to choose between one of the following:
{{Card List|delim=;|amount=5|show_caption=1|Guide to Freedom;Guide to Resistance;Guide to Ballad;Guide to Prosperity;Guide to Diligence;Guide to Gold;Guide to Transience;Guide to Elegance;Guide to Light;Guide to Admonition;Guide to Ingenuity;Guide to Praxis;Guide to Equity;Guide to Justice;Guide to Order;Guide to Contention;Guide to Kindling;Guide to Conflict}}
